statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeTraining
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM EmployeeTraining WHERE certification_name = 'AWS Certified'
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM EmployeeTraining ORDER BY certification_date DESC
SELECT employee_name, training_session_date FROM EmployeeTraining WHERE certification_name IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTraining WHERE employee_id = 12345
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTraining ORDER BY employee_name DESC, training_session_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_name, certification_name FROM EmployeeTraining WHERE certification_date >= '2022-01-01' AND employee_id > 100 ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, certification_name, certification_date FROM EmployeeTraining WHERE certification_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY certification_name ASC, certification_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTraining WHERE certification_name LIKE '%Java%' OR certification_name LIKE '%SQL%' ORDER BY certification_name ASC, certification_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, training_session_date FROM EmployeeTraining WHERE training_session_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY training_session_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM employee_training_sessions;
SELECT session_id, training_type, session_date FROM employee_training_sessions WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(session_id) AS total_sessions FROM employee_training_sessions GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT certification_name, certification_date FROM employee_certifications WHERE certification_status = 'Active' ORDER BY certification_date DESC;

SELECT certification_id, employee_id, certification_name, DATEDIFF(expiration_date, certification_date) AS days_remaining FROM employee_certifications WHERE expiration_date > CURDATE() ORDER BY days_remaining ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_training_sessions WHERE session_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY session_date DESC
SELECT employee_id, session_date, training_type FROM employee_training_sessions WHERE completion_status = TRUE
SELECT certification_name, certification_date, expiration_date FROM employee_certifications WHERE certification_status = 'Active' ORDER BY expiration_date
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(session_id) AS session_count FROM employee_training_sessions GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(session_id) > 2
SELECT employee_id, certification_name, certification_date, expiration_date FROM employee_certifications WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01'
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees;
SELECT certification_name, issuing_organization, issue_date FROM certifications;
SELECT session_date, session_duration, trainer_name FROM training_sessions;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date, certification_name, issue_date FROM employees JOIN certifications ON employees.certification_id = certifications.certification_id;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE certification_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT certification_name, issuing_organization, issue_date FROM certifications WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT session_date, session_duration, trainer_name, location FROM training_sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;

SELECT e.employee_name, c.certification_name, t.trainer_name FROM employees e JOIN certifications c ON e.certification_id = c.certification_id JOIN training_sessions t ON e.session_id = t.session_id WHERE t.location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM training_sessions;
SELECT emp_name, emp_department FROM employees;
SELECT session_id, session_name, session_date FROM training_sessions WHERE session_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT emp_name, emp_position, emp_department FROM employees ORDER BY emp_department ASC;

SELECT emp_id, emp_name, session_name, cert_name FROM employees JOIN emp_training ON employees.emp_id = emp_training.emp_id JOIN training_sessions ON emp_training.session_id = training_sessions.session_id JOIN certifications ON emp_training.cert_id = certifications.cert_id;
SELECT * FROM training_sessions;
SELECT session_name, session_date FROM training_sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT emp_name, emp_position FROM employees WHERE emp_department = 'IT';
SELECT cert_name, cert_description FROM certifications WHERE cert_validity_period > 1;
SELECT emp_name, session_name, completed FROM employees JOIN emp_training ON employees.emp_id = emp_training.emp_id WHERE completed = true;
SELECT * FROM employee;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee WHERE hire_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT session_name, trainer_name FROM training_session ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, completed FROM employee_training WHERE completed = TRUE;
SELECT certification_name, expiration_period FROM certification WHERE expiration_period > 2;
SELECT * FROM employee;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT e.employee_name, c.certification_name FROM employee e JOIN employee_certification ec ON e.employee_id = ec.employee_id JOIN certification c ON c.certification_id = ec.certification_id;
SELECT session_name, trainer_name FROM training_session WHERE session_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY trainer_name DESC;

SELECT e.employee_name, t.trainer_name, et.completion_date FROM employee e JOIN employee_training et ON e.employee_id = et.employee_id JOIN training_session t ON t.session_id = et.session_id WHERE et.completed = TRUE ORDER BY et.completion_date DESC;
